book.synopsis: Surprised that a diminutive newcomer to the Scottish highlands has remained steadfast to her new home in spite of an inhospitable winter, constable Hamish Macbeth learns that the woman has deluded herself into believing that she is engaged to a local artist, a situation that turns deadly when she is found poisoned. 30,000 first printing.
book.title_long: Death of a Dreamer (Hamish Macbeth Mysteries, No. 22)
book.dimensions: Height: 8.5 Inches, Length: 5.75 Inches, Weight: 0.9 Pounds, Width: 0.875 Inches
